title: Development Process of Group Essay Evaluation Metrics Using Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience with digital collaboration tools
context.additional_context: Students use online collaboration systems (e.g., Google Docs) to design group math education programs, write evaluation reports, and conduct peer/self-assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more essay quality prediction indicators by analyzing version histories and comment interactions generated during group collaboration
Learners can prepare analytical evaluation reports comparing correlations between peer evaluator roles and instructor evaluations
Learners can maintain group essay completion rates above 90% while performing active comment interactions at over 80% frequency in online collaboration systems
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
